attributes.action: LISTEN TO THE PUBLIC SECTOR WORKERS ABOUT PAY AND STOP TREATING THEM LIKE THE ENEMY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Miniter stops and listens to the 1,000,000+ public sector workers. These are the backbone of Great Britain and the country does not need a winter of striking which WILL ruin our great country. Please start treating them like human beings. All they ask for is what they were promised in their pay deals.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
